from math import log

n, k = map(int, input().split())
print(int(log(n, k)) + 1)  # log(n, k)

# get input
n, k = map(int, input().split())

# initialize
digits = 0

# iterate until n is 0
while n > 0:
    # increment digit count
    digits += 1
    # divide by k
    n //= k

# print result
print(digits)

# get input
n, k = map(int, input().split())

# print result (floor of log)
print(math.floor(math.log(n, k)))
from math import log

n, k = map(int, input().split())
print(int(log(n, k)) + 1)

from math import log

n, k = map(int, input().split())
print(int(log(n)/log(k)) + 1)
# get inputs
n, k = map(int, input().split())


digits = 0

while n > 0:
    digits += 1
    n //= k

print(digits)


# get input
n, k = map(int, input().split())

# initialize
digits = 0

# iterate until n is 0
while n > 0:
    # increment digit
    digits++
    # divide by k
    n //= k

# print result
print(digits)

# get inputs
n, k = map(int, input().split())  # n: number, k: base

# initialize
digits = 0

# iterate until n is 0
while n > 0:
    # increment digit count
    digits += 1
    # divide by k
    n //= k

# print result
print(digits)

from math import log

n, k = map(int, input().split())
print(int(log(n, k)) + 1)

# get inputs
n, k = map(int, input().split())

# initialize
digits = 0

# iterate until n is 0
while n > 0:
    # increment digit count
    digits += 1
    # divide by k
    n //= k

# print result
print(digits)
